column1: This solar charger works well at first and charges phones well but does not adequately charge iPads or Kindles. The LED flashlight is quite bright. Performance over time is not reliable as the charge battery begins to not hold charge. A battery charge level indicator would be helpful. Overall, a decent purchase for a backup or travel.
column2: This solar charger is a great alternative to a power source for recharging a smartphone or other electronic device. It can be charged with electricity or solar power making it a great backup for charging devices while on a hike or other long distance trip. It is recommended for use with iPhone and Kindles, but not with other devices. The flashlight is also useful. Overall, this product is recommended.

column1: Can be a little pricey at $3.80 per bar, but these NuGo bars offer a low calorie, low glycemic index snack that is healthy and still taste great. Taste is reminiscent of Rice Krispie treats, especially the variety with vanilla frosting. Some stores don't carry these bars, but they are available easily online.
column2: These are a great healthy snack for the whole family. They are high in protein and have a nice sweet taste. They can be a bit chewy at first, but once they start to loosen up, they are great for filling up on calories. These are a good value for the money and are good for the health.

column1: At just 170 calories each, NuGo bars are nice to have for a meal or a snack. The texture is similar to Rice Krispie Treats and they even taste like them. It's hard to believe this is a healthy, soy-based food! They're great to keep handy in case a quick pick-me-up is needed.
column2: These are a great healthy snack for the whole family. They are high in protein and have a nice sweet taste. They can be a bit chewy at first, but once they start to loosen up, they are great for filling up on calories. These are a good value for the money and are good for the health.

column1: Bonine tablets are an excellent choice for preventing motion sickness. They effectively prevent motion sickness from cars, boats, and amusement park rides. A bonus: the chewable tablets do not cause drowsiness.

The chewable tablets don't taste too bad and are easy to swallow. This is recommended for those who get motion sickness easily.

column1: This is a very effective option for dealing with motion sickness. It can be used for car rides, amusement parks and even multi-day cruises, all without the side effects seen with Dramamine.
